content:
### Enhanced nodes


* [Edit Image:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.editimage.md) Added Circle Primitive to Draw operation. Also added Composite operation.
* [Zendesk:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.zendesk.md) Added check for API credentials validity.
* [Zulip:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.zulip.md) Added additional field Role to the Update operation of the User resource.
